extendedInfo.description: Save time doing dictionary lookups! Simply point your camera at some Chinese text to get all the English definitions. And everything works offline.Within just a couple of seconds of launching this Chinese OCR app, and without even touching the screen, you can be viewing word-by-word definitions of a complete line of Chinese text.  The auto-snapshot feature means you won't have to keep awkwardly trying to position your camera.Please Note:* This app is designed for reading regular Chinese text (like in a book).  It is not intended for reading things like shop signs, food labels or other images using stylized text, so please bear this in mind before purchasing.* This app is designed for students learning Chinese* Details on how to get this paid app (living in China?): http://goo.gl/YGonRIf you encounter ANY problems (e.g. stretched live preview) please contact us at hanping@embermitre.com and we will do our very best to fix it.  We have done lots of testing on many different devices but there may be some problematic camera drivers we have not yet come across.If you're not satisfied, for any reason, within 30 days you get a full refund, period, no questions asked. We don't want your money if you're not amazingly happy.Features:â Scans live camera preview as well as still images (such as photos)â Works entirely offline! (INTERNET permission is only for dictionary updates etc)â Simplified and Traditional charactersâ Recognizes over 8000 different charactersâ Pinyin and Zhuyin (Bopomofo) pronunciationâ Horizontal & vertical textâ Fast - most devices perform recognition in a fraction of a secondâ Optimized for pages of regular text (such as in a book)â Clear, regular fonts should work well in general, but you may need to use the controls to reframe the textâ Recognized Chinese characters are drawn over the image, allowing you to easily verify accuracyâ Each character is colored according to its toneâ Breaks text down into words, displaying all corresponding dictionary entriesâ Supports pan, zoom, and pinch-to-zoomâ Resizeable image windowâ Seamlessly integrates with Hanping Chinese Dictionary (which you will need to install - it's free! - to see the dictionary entries)There are two View modes:1. Live ViewThe screen shows the live camera preview and the app continuously scans it for Chinese.  As words are recognized, the corresponding dictionary entries are displayed.Live View has two sub-modes:a) Auto: the camera is continuously refocused and a snapshot is automatically taken as soon as the characters are recognized.b) Manual: you control when to focus and whether to use flash (if your device supports it). You also choose when to snapshot the preview image.2. Image ViewWorks with still images which are either snapshots of the camera preview or existing images (e.g. photos) you already have on your Android device.Memory UsageInternal: 6MBExternal/SD card: 34MB (or 0MB if you already have Hanping Chinese Dictionary installed, because they share the same dictionary database)Please use the forum (see below) to report any bugs or suggestions.Blog: http://embermitre.comForum: http://embermitre.com/hanpingTwitter: http://twitter.com/embermitre

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: My favorite Chinese dictionary! Very well put together and very well supported! Worth every penny!
reviews.author: Julian Bigelow

reviews.title: Best Chinese OCR available
reviews.comment: Well worth the purchase. Save so much time doing dictionary look-ups and makes reading Chinese texts easy.
reviews.author: Dave Flynn

reviews.title: very usefull add-on
reviews.comment: Works nicely with the Hanping Pro dictionary.
reviews.author: Olaf Eichst\303\244dt

reviews.title: Really works well.
reviews.comment: I have tried other camera dictionaries on my phone which work to varying degres and I really do feel this is far better. It is user friendly, quick and mostly (since of course reading custom fonts or handwriting will cause problems for any programme) accurate. The price is right and it integrtes well with a link in the Hanping Dictionary Pro too. I had some queries and the developer got back to me in a matter of hours. All happy. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Ross Venables

reviews.title: really helpful
reviews.comment: It can read vertical words! Perfect!
reviews.author: Fanni Hsu

reviews.title: Graphic Chinese Translation
reviews.comment: Great job, definitely worth the money!
reviews.author: Thomas Regnier

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: Absolutely incredible. If you\'re even thinking about considering buying this app then do it. Amazingly helpful.
reviews.author: killian coate

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This app is nothing short of amazing. Must have for Chinese learners, and even more so for anyone travelling or living in China. Worth every penny.
reviews.author: Vlad Corduneanu

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Must have app for Chinese study!
reviews.author: Varunchai Srisakulpinyo

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: works amazingly well - the most useful app for anyone travelling or living in China
reviews.author: Alex Valkov

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: This was well worth the money, for me. Of course, a dollar or two for owners of the main app would have been sweet. I would probably buy another copy for my wife if it had English recognition.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Bought to support developer. This is an amazing app! Worth much more than the current price. Remember a few years back when we all bought $100 \"eletronic dictionaries\" and how bad they were!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I wish this had been available years ago when i was more actively learning Chinese in China. It works quite well and very quickly. We definitely live in the future now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The BEST
reviews.comment: I\'m studying Mandarin. At first I thought this all would spoil me because it makes reading so easy and it\'s really fast in recognizing characters. But since I\'m a beginner it actually helps me in reading other materials, also instructions so I\'m definitely going to recommend this to all studying Chinese. I bought all their apps, including the in-app purchase except the Chinese-English additional dictionary because I can\'t afford it yet. I hope they will make it more affordable soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very useful app in China. Helps a lot. Developer is also quick to respond. Looking forward to further updates and features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the developer
reviews.comment: This is going to be handy! Tried it on five lines on the back of a book. It read the first four perfectly. On the fifth one it fouled up. Got every character wrong & said it was a similar character. Hope it doesn\'t do that again! Love Hanping and it\'s developer! Didn\'t have to re-purchase the Hanping cidian after I got a new phone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says. Has convinced me that computer technology is good enough that I need not learn Chinese characters for occasional travelling/living in China.
reviews.author: Aaron Staley

reviews.title: Excellent offline tool
reviews.comment: Very good recognition integrates well with dictionary app. Interface takes some getting used to but all in all worth the money.
reviews.author: Sander Van de Moortel

reviews.title: Great app, great price
reviews.comment: and works offline, so no roaming charges :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: really. though the interface is a little clunky
reviews.author: A Google User
